Title: Oriole
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alex Gansa, Patrick Harbinson, Charlotte Stoudt (executive story editor)
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Sebastian Koch, Miranda Otto
Plot: Carrie reconnects with old friends. Saul opens up to Allison.
